alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 6:50PM EST until January 21 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Delaware county. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Potential frostbite on exposed skin if spending extended periods outside. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous wind chills are expected in the catskills at elevations above 2000 feet where temperatures will be in the single digits and winds near 20 mph.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
